data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting 10-08-2024
data.news_body: 1. Approved the Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the period ended on 30th June, 2024 as review by the Audit Committee.2. Approved the revision of earlier resolution passed by the Board on 18th day of July 2024 (for Acquiring additional Shares upto 16% of M/s Vraj Metaliks Private Limited so that Company hold 51% stake in the said Company). However instead of acquiring upto 16% of shares, Company intends to acquire upto 15% of shares of Vraj Metaliks Private Limited so that the holding does not exceed 49.99%.  3. Approved the implementation of proposal for setting up of 20MWp Captive Solar Power Plant.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Vraj Iron And Steel Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 03, 2024, the equity shares of Vraj Iron And Steel Ltd (Scrip Code: 544204) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of ''T'' Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20240702-  dated July 02, 2024.
